nodes.text: Lieutenant Jenbean was a male who was one of the watch officers of the Senate Communications Center during the Clone Wars. He received a transmission that showed Reija Momen reading a statement prepared by Pors Tonith that described Tonith's plans for exterminating his hostages. Jenbean delivered this transmission to Supreme Chancellor Palpatine. After Palpatine decided to ignore the transmission, Jenbean retransmitted it to Jedi Master Nejaa Halcyon, Anakin Skywalker, and Captain Zozridor Slayke on Praesitlyn.
